SA05n890:3: tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva-
SA05n890:4: stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ |
SA05n890:5: tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ
SA05n890:6: tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ ||2 ||
SA05n890:10: annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 3 ||
SA05n890:11: pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca-
SA05n890:13: sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako'si
SA05n890:14: tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 4 ||
SA05n890:15: śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
SA05n890:17: dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
SA05n890:20: dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam || 6 ||
